additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Glycerin, Bisethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Undecane, Tridecane, Niacinamide, Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetyl Palmitate, Sorbitan Palmitate, Dextran, Trifluoroacetyl Tripeptide-2, Anigozanthos Flavidus (Kangaroo Paw) Extract, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Disodium EDTA, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Xanthan Gum, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract, Santalum Acuminatum (Quandong) Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Extract, Sodium PCA, Fragrance.

description: Enhanced with Peptides, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin B3, C and SKIN ectura to assist in rebuilding the skins architecture to restore a younger skin appearance. Suitable for all skin types Pack size
name: Rewind Age Defence Day Cream SPF 15
